Well, my presence was requested to review this so here we go. Those whores definitely deserve it. This book? Well, the grammar is quite bad right now. I hope it will be re-edited soon. The character of the girl? Eh, felt plain and just agrees with anything that is going on. Art is quite nice I must say. Overall 7/10 355121

i really don't like the cheating tag and im not big about milfs, but this was surprisingly good. the story accomplishes what i call Schrödinger's rape where there's a rape so consensual that it turns into rape or consensual sex dependent on what your preferences are. also i think the author set up a sequel wonderfully. all in all i think this would be rated a 8/10 up to 9/10 depending on tag and art preferences.

@tobajas Probably, I agree. Let's see what happens, hopefully we get some confirmation on her situation in the next chapter. I'm genuinely curious to see if the author just dedicates each chapter to these 3 women and ends it at the last woman, or if we will see a culmination with all of them at the end. 

@Darkstar75 I am glad I am not the only one who likely sees it. It's possible that this needs a bit of a better translation, but we'll see if that is the case or this was just the original dialogue.
@Darkstar75 words* if you're gonna correct someone's grammar you should make sure you're using proper grammar
The uploader forgot to add the poor grammar tag. I see some sentences that do make any sense and word that need to be fixed in the sentence to make it sound correct.

@bbdo Might be right with what you guessed kinda up in the air at this point. My guess is that yeah the kid showed at the start is not the wives biological kid and the husband and wife have been trying to make another one but it haven't worked out so far. Either cause the wife is infertile or something else, author will probably have the shopkeeper impregnate her in a later chapter or just show her being pregnant.
678 holy fuck these comments

The whole premise is still ridiculous, don't get me wrong, but it felt even more confusing with this guy's supposed investigative skills without actually learning anything. Dude mentions the childbirth if it was too much on her on page 13, but then she says no it didn't, so I am still rather confused on whether she even gave birth or not, or if the child passed away maybe... again too many unanswered questions and just a weird setup overall

Part 2: hollow as a character. I felt like the author tried to show the owner knows a lot about the wife through way he tells her how unsatisfied she is with her current marriage and that is why she reverted to petty larceny to get some excitement but we get very little in terms of confirmation and understanding about the wife's actions and she was just confused most the way until she submits to his "sexual prowess" out of nowhere when it takes it out of her. Spent too much time rudimentary dirty talk and sex dialogue and got nothing out of the wife who just submits when it appears she had a bit more to her background when first introduced. Eh..... but hey the art is pretty good, have to give it to the artist.

Not going to lie, there is something about the dialogue that doesn't seem to add up from the wife. I don't know if this is an issue with how the author wrote the dialogue or translation error, but the wife. seems so confused for most of the experience with the way she words the experience and never seems to clarify anything, then on page 32 when the owner tries to get her to admit how good she feels in comparison with her husband, she brings up how she doesn't "understand any of this" and how she "wasn't even able to bear my husband's child" From the little dialogue exchange we get between her and the "daughter" it appears that it may not even be her own daughter, but a daughter from a previous marriage, especially the way Kazue referred to her as "Hey" and seemed almost annoyed at having to remind her to hurry up and finish breakfast. But that's just me looking into why she said that about not bearing her husband's child and who the little girl was. Besides that wife just felt really
